portsIn.value:
*Normal respiratory rate 12-20 so 3-5 seconds for 1 cycle

*Creature dies if there's no input in 2 minutes

- (d)Make it so that the extremities are distorted
and looklike curves
- (d) find LungAvgRate, LungDepth
- (d) make 123 breathVolume
- d Gm will control this


Make feedback Look

connect all to to Bauplan

d Make guide
d Set Bauplan as Dice
d Make ambient cues and encounters (save baustates make encounters of of them)
d Derive abilities from morphology (???)

d Tie-in midnight
d Make <<map>>
